sprykerComponent.name: summary-overview
sprykerComponent.readme:
Displays a subtotal, discounts, shipping, tax, and grand total for list of products on checkout summary step.

Code sample

{% include molecule('summary-overview', 'CheckoutPage') with {
    data: data.overview
} only %}

defines.name: data
defines.contract:
shipmentMethod: required,
    expenses: [],
    voucherDiscounts: [],
    cartRuleDiscounts: [],

    prices: {
        subTotal: required,
        storeCurrency: required,
        tax: required,
        grandTotal: required,
        discountTotal: null
    }
